description: Publishes a development schema with a major version and a recommended minor version.

parameters.name: DevelopmentSchemaArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that is associated with the development schema. For more information, see  arns.

parameters.name: Version
parameters.description: The major version under which the schema will be published. Schemas have both a major and minor version associated with them.

nested_items.name: PublishedSchemaArn
nested_items.description: The ARN that is associated with the published schema. For more information, see  arns.
